charges.charge_description: COUNT 2-Charging dfts with knowingly and w/o authorization to do so, offer to sell, barter or offer to barter, migratory birds, to wit: 3 bald eagles and one golden eagle or aided and abetted one another in the same, in violation of 16:703.F TAKING, KILLING, OR POSSESSING MIGRATORY BIRDS and 16:707(b)(2) and AIDING AND ABETTING in violation of 18:2. (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft sentenced to custody of bureau of prisons for 12 months and 1 day; supervised release for 1 year; Restitution in amount of $4800.00 to be paid jointly and severally with co-dft. Pymts to be made to Clerk of Court and will be disbursed to Mont. State Fish &; Game Dept. Dft will be given credit for time served. Court will recommend Yankton,SD. Special assmt in amount $100.00...REVOCATION PROCEEDING HELD 12/4/98 AND DFT'S RELEASE REVOKED. Court resentenced dft to 6 months custody to be served in Roosevelt County Jail and dft to continue to pay the restitution amount of orig. sentence. (2)

charges.charge_description: COUNT 1-Dft charged with knowingly and without authorization to do so, take migratory birds, to wit: 3 bald eagles and one golden eagle with the intent to sell offer to sell, barter, or offer to barter such birds in violation of 16:703.F TAKING, KILLING, OR POSSESSING MIGRATORY BIRDS and 16:707 (b)(1). (1)

COUNT 3-Charging dft with knowingly and w/o authorization to do so take migratory birds to wit: 3 eagles with the intent to sell, offer to sell, barter or offer to barter such bird in violation of 16:703.F TAKING, KILLING, OR POSSESSING MIGRATORY BIRDS and 16:707(b)(1) which is violations and penalties-forfeitures (3)

COUNT 4-Charging dfts with knowingly taking migratory birds to wit: 3 eagles or aided and abetted one another in the same violation of 16:703.F TAKING, KILLING, OR POSSESSING MIGRATORY BIRDS and 16:707 (b)(2) and 18:2. (4)

COUNT 5-Charging dft w/knowingly and w/o authorization to do so, take migratory birds to wit: two rough legged hawks with intent to sell in violation of 16:703.F TAKING, KILLING, OR POSSESSING MIGRATORY BIRDS and 16:707 (b)(1). (5)

COUNT 6-Charging dft with knowingly and w/o authorization to do so, sell, offer for sell, barter to wit: to rough legged hawks in violation of 16:703.F TAKING, KILLING, OR POSSESSING MIGRATORY BIRDS and 16:707 (b)(2) which is violations and penalties-forfeitures. (6)

COUNT 7-Charging dft with knowingly and w/o authorization to do so to wit: eagles and rough legged hawks with intent to offer or sell in violation of 16:703.F TAKING, KILLING, OR POSSESSING MIGRATORY BIRDS and 16:707 (b)(1) and use of a firearm to wit: a Ruger.22-250 bolt action making said firearms forfeitable to the Govt pursuant to 16:707(c). (7)

COUNT 2-Charging dfts with knowingly and w/o authorization to do so, offer to sell, barter or offer to barter, migratory birds, to wit: 3 bald eagles and one golden eagle or aided and abetted one another in the same, in violation of 16:703.F TAKING, KILLING, OR POSSESSING MIGRATORY BIRDS and 16:707(b)(2) and AIDING AND ABETTING in violation of 18:2. (2)

COUNT 4-Charging dfts with knowingly taking migratory birds to wit: 3 eagles or aided and abetted one another in the same violation of 16:703.F TAKING, KILLING, OR POSSESSING MIGRATORY BIRDS and 16:707 (b)(2) and 18:2. (4)

charges.charge_disposition: Count 4 is dism on Motion of AUSA (4)
